pr_title: Throw DdlException when use admin set frontend config

timeline.message:
Add tip info when use admin set frontend config

When execute Ddl `admin set frontend config`. User will get msg `ERROR
1064 (HY000): Unexpected exception: null`, it is confusing, we should
give user a more friendly tip info.

timeline.bodyText: This should be done in AdminSetConfigStmt's analyze method.
timeline.author: morningman
